attributes.action: The Culture Secretary and Prime Minister should call on Status Quo to appoint John Coghlan as their new drummer.
attributes.additional_details:
Love them or loathe them - Status Quo are a national institution.

Recently they have embarked on a reunion tour with their original line up including John Coghlan on drums. John originally left the band in 1981 and many would say that their sound has never quite been the same since. The recent reunion shows would reinforce this.

Status Quo are now in search of a new drummer and now is the time to bring John back into the fold.

Sign the petition now to ask the Culture Secretary and PM to champion the cause to bring John home.
